attributes.action: use the bank fines for the N.H.S. shortfall in the budget
attributes.additional_details: Pass the fines payable by the crooked banks direct to the N.H.S.  Without any government interference. This would make up for the budget shortfall. Leave this as a permanent arrangement to keep the banks clean and support the N.H.S.  As this money was raised by a fine the government cannot have plans for it(not in any budget calculations)
